header.title: Play and earn Your LanaCoin
header.instructions: Jump over obstacles to increase Lana's value! Complete 37 successful jumps to earn your 1 Registered Lana. Each jump doubles the price and user base!

status.initial: Let's have some fun while getting rich.

footer.description: After you complete the game, you'll create your Lana Wallet and sign your profile via the decentralised Nostr protocol. From then on, you own your dataâ€”your private key stays with you and unlocks access to 20+ apps across Lana World.
footer.ownership: Lana is owned by everyone who participates this eco system. Let's co-create the new reality

returnNotice: You'll return to {{siteName}} after creating your profile

skip.description: Skip the game and create your wallet directly (no prize earned)

easy.description: Perfect for learning! Slower speed, wider gaps.
